ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS-2 SCM Search Coil Magnetometer Level-1a Calibration Waveform (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains MMS-2 SCM L1A calibration waveform. The SCM calibration is executed at least once per orbit. The calibration signal sweep is broken into 4 segments with increasing sample frequencies and the whole calibration sequence lasts less than 90 sec. The frequency of the calibration signal doubles every 4 cycles from 0.125 Hz to 4096 Hz. Each segment consist of four different frequencies.
